entry.title: ES6 常用语法
entry.content: 1、变量解构赋值1234567891011121314151617181920// 对象赋值let user = { name : "草依山", age : 18}// 获取name属性的值let { name } = userconsole.log(name) // 打印：草依山// 数组赋值let [x,y] = [1,2,3]const.log(x+y) // 打印：3// 字符串赋值let {length : len} = 'hello'console.log(len) // 打印：5// 函数赋值console.log([[1, 2], [3, 4]].map(([a, b]) => a + b)) // 打印：[3,7]function add([x,y]) { return x + y;}console.log(add([1,2])) // 打印：3 2、数组骚操作123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536// 数组求交集let array = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7].filter(item=>[2,3,5,6,8].indexOf(item)>-1)console.log(array) // 打印：2,3,5,6// 获取两个数组属性id相等的部分let arr1=[{id:1,name:'网'},{id:2,name:'二位'}]let arr2=[{id:1,name:'问问'},{id:3,name:'多少'},{id:44,name:'多少'}, {id:45,name:'多少'},]let add=arr2.filter(item=>!arr1.some(ele=>ele.id===item.id))console.log(add) // 打印：[{id:2,name:'二位'},id:3,name:'多少'},{id:44,name:'多少'},{id:45,name:'多少'}]// map过滤数组属性let array = [ { name:'张三', nums:55 }]let newArray = array.map(item => { return { value: item.nums }})console.log(newArray) // 打印：[55]// 拓展运算符let array = [5,3]console.log(...array) // 打印：5 3// 浅拷贝let a = [5,3]let b = [...a] // 等价于 let a = [5,3] let b = a.concat()// 合并数组let aa = [1,2]let bb = [3,4] let cc = [...aa,...bb] // 打印： [1,2,3,4]
